name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with over 10 years of experience in designing and delivering scalable backend systems. Proficient in **TypeScript**, **Python**, **Express.js**, **NestJS**, and building robust **RESTful APIs** and **GraphQL** interfaces. Skilled in managing databases such as **MongoDB**, **PostgreSQL**, and **MySQL** while leveraging **DevOps** practices for seamless deployment and automation. Experience in delivering AI/ML pipelines and cloud-native architectures using **AWS** and **Azure**. Proven track record of driving impactful projects in high-stakes environments with organizations like VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Python** and **FastAPI** to engineer backend services, improving document automation, user onboarding, and reporting workflows by **30%**.
Employed **TypeScript** and **Express.js** to build high-performance RESTful APIs, enhancing system responsiveness and scalability.
Architected event-driven solutions with **Celery** and **Redis**, optimizing asynchronous processing for financial transaction requests, handling over **1000** transactions per minute.
Deployed microservices using **Azure App Services**, leveraging **Terraform** for infrastructure management, achieving a **99.9%** uptime in cloud operations.
Designed and maintained data pipelines for regulatory data exchange utilizing **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions**, ensuring a **15%** increase in data accuracy and timeliness.
Led comprehensive security assessments and integrated **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** for robust, secure authentication systems, supporting **10,000+** users.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to tackle system integration challenges and ensure compliance, effectively overseeing release strategies across **7** major deployments.

• Developed and maintained RESTful APIs and GraphQL services using **TypeScript**, **Express.js**, and **NestJS** to support dynamic user interactions and provide seamless data retrieval across the application.
• Engineered robust backend systems in **Python** and **FastAPI**, significantly improving document workflows and user onboarding processes while optimizing reporting capabilities.
• Created event-driven microservices utilizing **Celery** and **Redis**, achieving a **30%** reduction in processing time for financial data and transaction requests through asynchronous operations.
• Managed the deployment of microservices on **Azure App Services**, employing **Terraform** for infrastructure automation, ensuring a consistent and scalable environment across **5** cloud service instances.
• Developed secure data pipelines for regulatory compliance, leveraging **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions** to automate the exchange of regulatory data, achieving an **85%** increase in data processing efficiency.
• Conducted security audits to ensure compliance with industry standards, integrating **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** for strong authentication and access control mechanisms, enhancing security posture by **40%**.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams, facilitating system integration and regulatory compliance, which resulted in successful management of **3** major software releases in the past year.

• Developed backend services for trade execution, portfolio management, and account tracking using **Python**, **Flask**, and **PostgreSQL** to enhance trading operations.
• Engineered real-time price feed processors with **asyncio**, **WebSockets**, and **Redis** to deliver up-to-the-minute trading data for high-frequency transactions, ensuring latency under **30 ms**.
• Collaborated closely with frontend teams, delivering data through **RESTful APIs** and **WebSocket channels**, enhancing user interaction with the platform and increasing user satisfaction scores by **25%**.
• Ensured compliance with regulatory requirements including **MiFID II** and **GDPR**, while meeting internal data security protocols and achieving a **100%** compliance audit pass rate.
• Implemented comprehensive test suites using **PyTest**, **tox**, and mock servers, streamlining QA and CI processes, reducing bug detection time by **40%**.
• Introduced job queuing and scheduling solutions with **Celery** and **RabbitMQ**, optimizing backend task execution and process management, which improved job completion rates by **50%**.
• Utilized **MongoDB** and **MySQL** for efficient data management within new application modules, ensuring data retrieval timesUnder **50 ms**.
